name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 4, the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection issued a major statement: The risk of diplomatic and foreign affairs cadres being subverted and corrupted is relatively high. Netizens generally speculated that it was related to the Qin Gang incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 3, students from Jiaowei Township Central Primary School in Xuwen County, Zhanjiang City, Guangdong Province, all wore helmets to school.
It is reported that the school requires every student to wear a helmet to school, whether walking or riding in a car.
The reporter learned from the local education bureau that there is a document requirement for helmets to enter the campus for the safety of students, but there is no requirement for everyone to enforce it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 4, due to the 6th China International Import Expo, the east-west road from Suzhou Creek on the Bund to Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street was closed, but the north-south road was not closed yet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens submitted an article: A county in Henan has not paid pensions for half a year
Hello, Mr. Li, this is my first submission, and it is also the first time I have truly felt powerlessness.
My grandfather lives in the "predecessor" of a national poverty-stricken county in Henan Province. The day before yesterday, I went home to visit my grandfather who was discharged from the hospital due to illness. I didn't expect to learn that he had not paid pensions for nearly half a year
He said, "People are almost dying, so how long are we waiting?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of November 3, a student from Sichuan University attempted suicide by jumping into a river because he could not bear the pressure from his counselor. In his last words, he said that he would never let the counselor Qian go. 
Unexpectedly, after the incident, the counselor Qian not only did not show due concern for the student, but also posted a QQ space mockery in the early morning of the 4th.
